title: Altseason? Bitcoin Price Flat as XRP, ETH, XLM Near 20% Daily Returns
text:
Altseason? Bitcoin Price Flat as XRP, ETH, XLM Near 20% Daily Returns

Cryptocurrency News 1 hour ago (Sep 18, 2019 07:41AM ET)

© Reuters. Altseason? Bitcoin Price Flat as XRP, ETH, XLM Near 20% Daily Returns (BTC) was still staying close to $10,200 on Sept. 18 as the largest cryptocurrency left it to altcoins to produce investor gains. Data from Coin360 showed enter yet another day of flat performance, slowly eroding support above $10,000. Keep track of top crypto markets in real time hereContinue Reading on Coin Telegraph
